store_id, t_store_info.version, store_code, store_name, store_phone, store_manager_id, store_license_code, store_address, store_invitation_code, store_province_code, store_city_code, store_region_code
mapper.select: SELECT t_store_info.store_code, t_store_info.store_name, t_store_info.store_address, t_sys_user_info.user_name, t_sys_user_info.user_phone, (SELECT area_name from t_area_name where t_store_info.store_province_code = t_area_name.area_name_id) as province_name, (SELECT area_name from t_area_name where t_store_info.store_city_code = t_area_name.area_name_id) as city_name, (SELECT area_name from t_area_name where t_store_info.store_region_code = t_area_name.area_name_id) as region_name from t_store_info LEFT JOIN t_sys_user_info on t_sys_user_info.user_id = t_store_info.store_manager_id where t_store_info.store_province_code = (SELECT driver_province_code from t_driver_info where driver_user_code = #{userId}) and t_store_info.store_city_code = (SELECT driver_city_code from t_driver_info where driver_user_code = #{userId}) and t_store_info.store_region_code = (SELECT driver_region_code from t_driver_info where driver_user_code = #{userId})
